name: RenderContainerOptions
description: A function that takes a renderer and does the custom rendering logic. This is the function that will be called each frame. ```js import { RenderContainer } from 'pixi.js'; // create a new render container const renderContainer = new RenderContainer((renderer) => { // custom render logic here renderer.clear({ clearColor: 'green', // clear the screen to green when rendering this item }); }); ``` / export type RenderFunction = (renderer: Renderer) => void; /** Options for the {@link RenderContainer} constructor.

properties.name: render
properties.description: the optional custom render function if you want to inject the function via the constructor

properties.name: containsPoint
properties.description: how to know if the custom render logic contains a point or not, used for interaction

properties.name: addBounds
properties.description: how to add the bounds of this object when measuring

properties.name: clearColor
properties.type:
'green', // clear the screen to green when rendering this item
 *      })

properties.name: clearColor
properties.type:
'green', // clear the screen to green when rendering this item
 *     })

properties.name: options
NOTE
properties.type:
this is for backwards compatibility with the old bounds system
        this._bounds.clear()
